name: Prismadale (gameryashu)
description: -- PRISMADALE -- ============= arrows - move (you can double jump) z - main attack / pass text x - special attack ============= Unlock 12 unique attacks, and use them to fight 6 unique enemies plus a boss. Once you beat 15 enemies, you will get a key to show that you can unlock the ruined shrine. Attack the shrine at the end of a section to unlock the color it contains. Jump on chests 7 times to unlock them and get health. There is no penalty for deaths, so try out lots of things to see what fighting style works for you
